action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Mechanical Engineering
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Fifteen years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: Bachelor
OTHER-SKILLS: Project management
AVAILABILITY: Anytime next month

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: Yes.

ME:  What is the name of the company you are applying to? Please answer with the name of the company.

ANSWER: Company Name.

ME:  What is the job title you are applying for? Please answer with the job title.

ANSWER: Job Title.

ME:  What is the job description you are applying for? Please answer with the job description.

ANSWER
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: Yes.

ME: Thank you. Please answer this question carefully. Have you worked in the field of your bachelor for at least 10 years? Please answer yes or no.
NA
ME: Please follow my instructions. Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: Yes.

ME: Please expand on the field of your bachelor. Please answer in short, direct sentences.

ASIDE: I have a Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering.

ME: Please expand on the industry experience you have. Please answer in short, direct sentences.

ASIDE: I have 15 years of experience in the industry.

NA

ANSWER: Yes.

NA
ME: Please think about it carefully. Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: Yes.

ME: Thank you. Please expand on the field of your bachelor. What specific areas of mechanical engineering did you study? Please answer with a short description.

ASIDE: The field of mechanical engineering is a broad field that encompasses the design, development, and manufacturing of mechanical systems and machines. It includes the study of materials science, fluid dynamics, thermodynamics, and manufacturing processes.

NA

ME: Thank you. Please expand on the field of your bachelor. What specific areas of mechanical engineering did you study? Please answer with a short description.

ASIDE: The field of mechanical engineering is a broad field that encompasses the design, development, and manufacturing of mechanical systems and machines. It includes the study of materials science, fluid dynamics, thermodynamics, and manufacturing processes.
